mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence concerning the request of Mubarak bin Nasir Al Khalifa (based in Saudi Arabia) for financial assistance from Salman bin Hamad Al Khalifa, Ruler of Bahrain. The request was declined.The correspondents are Arnold Crawshaw Galloway, Political Agent, Kuwait; Cornelius James Pelly, Political Agent, Bahrain; Mubarak bin Nasir Al Khalifa; Salman bin Hamad, Ruler of Bahrain; Charles Dalrymple Belgrave, Adviser to the Bahrain Government.
